text: Shi ta [an la] cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shi ge zhong zhiwu shengzhang, zhang chu luse de zhiye, jie chu leilei de guoshi, cong ye zao shu de huaxu zhong jie chu cheng chuan de zaozi,[tongshi chang chu] putao, ganlan he shiliu de guoyuan, qi guoshi [zhonglei he weidao] you xiangtong de, yeyou bu xiangtong de. Dang tamen jieguoshi, nimen dang guancha guo shi de chengzhang qingkuang. Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
